settings.h1_video_subtext: How well do you brush? With iD Stain Eraser, you can identify stains before they become a problem.

settings.desc_best_seller: For neutralising yellow undertones and brightening dull white teeth.,For peroxide-free whitening that fits in your pocket.,Convenient whitening + colour correcting technology for a whiter & brighter smile.,For turning any daily toothpaste into a whitening toothpaste.

settings.r_star_product_desc: PAP+ Teeth Whitening Strips plus our V34 Colour Corrector Serum for an instantly whiter & brighter smile.

settings.r_paragraph_title: We’re building the future of smile care, backed by science & proven by you.
settings.r_paragrapth_text: Every day we’re in the Hismile Research Lab, learning from our community, and working with leading dentists to develop peroxide-free products to make you look good, and feel even better. As always, we’re backed by science, and driven by the belief that smile care can, and should, be both effective and safe.

settings.r_goal_desc: Based on our instant whitening formula PAP+, we’ve designed strips as our most convenient way to whiten yet.
HA5 Hyaluronic Mouthwash is an everyday essential, that leaves you feeling fresh and revitalised. It’s the perfect addition to your daily smile care routine.

settings.r_slider_text: We’ve got a solution for every smile, with expert formulation and incredible ingredients.
